results.title: Acute Ascending Muscle Weakness Secondary to Medication-Induced Hyperkalemia
results.text_hl: She reported waking up with @<m>DISEASE_Paraparesis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020335 @@@lower extremity weakness@@@ and became progressively weak and unable to ambulate throughout the course of the morning.
